charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Deidara (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Deidara (S) has been revived and is immediately sent out to battle. Fighting on the front lines is nothing new to this old soul.

abilities.name: Katsu
abilities.description: Using Katsu, Edo Tensei Deidara (S) targets one random enemy dealing 20 piercing damage. Deidara will be invulnerable to enemy mental skills for 1 turn when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Chakra Clay Trap
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Deidara (S) uses Chakra Clay Trap on one enemy. If that enemy uses a new harmful skill, that skill will be countered and that enemy will take 20 piercing damage and Katsu will deal 5 additional damage to that enemy permanently.The target of this skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Sonar Bat Bombs
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Deidara (S) uses Sonar Bat Bombs on all enemies dealing 10 Affliction damage. All enemies this skill damages will take an additional 5 damage from Katsu permanently. This effect stacks. This skill becomes Jellyfish Explosives when used.

abilities.name: Flying Clay Clone
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Deidara (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
